name: Another Side (Martin Mauersics)
description:
An endless space of nothingness, a single shape of light. Can you solve the mysteries of the cube?

Another Side is a minimalist puzzle cube made in less than sixteen hours on two Mi'pu'mi days with the jam theme "clickbait".

Input
ActionLeft Mouse Button
??? (click)
Right Mouse Button
??? (hold + move)

Music:
by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?genre=Contemporary)
